query: SELECT a.id, a.title, a.theme, a.platform, a.vibe, a.language, a.influences, a.trackCount, GROUP_CONCAT(t.title ORDER BY t.`index` SEPARATOR ' | ') as track_titles FROM albums a LEFT JOIN tracks t ON a.id = t.albumId WHERE a.id = (SELECT id FROM albums ORDER BY createdAt DESC LIMIT 1) GROUP BY a.id
command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 4PQbAAV1fA3eoWB.38fa72cffd94 --database b5PCTDMDy4xxT8TnZ4kC9Z --execute SELECT a.id, a.title, a.theme, a.platform, a.vibe, a.language, a.influences, a.trackCount, GROUP_CONCAT(t.title ORDER BY t.`index` SEPARATOR ' | ') as track_titles FROM albums a LEFT JOIN tracks t ON a.id = t.albumId WHERE a.id = (SELECT id FROM albums ORDER BY createdAt DESC LIMIT 1) GROUP BY a.id

rows.title: The High Cost of Division
rows.theme: Country songs with deep meaning about how  politicians and religion is a business, how they divide people by various means for self benefit instead of bring people together
rows.influences: ["Country like the gambler from Kenny rogers"]
rows.track_titles: The High Cost of Division | The High Cost of Division | The Price of the Pulpit | The Price of the Pulpit (Part 2) | The Price of the Line | The Price of the Pulpit (Part 3) | The Price of the Pulpit (Part 4) | The Shepherd's Empty Pockets | The Price of the Pulpit | The Common Ground
